thread.title: BRIEF-Canadian Solar Partners With Global Investment Holdings To Develop And Provide Services For Up To 300 MWp Solar Projects In EMEA

title: BRIEF-Canadian Solar Partners With Global Investment Holdings To Develop And Provide Services For Up To 300 MWp Solar Projects In EMEA
text:
Market News 07 AM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Canadian Solar Partners With Global Investment Holdings To Develop And Provide Services For Up To 300 MWp Solar Projects In EMEA Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 27 (Reuters) - Canadian Solar Inc:
* CANADIAN SOLAR PARTNERS WITH GLOBAL INVESTMENT HOLDINGS TO DEVELOP AND PROVIDE SERVICES FOR UP TO 300 MWP SOLAR PROJECTS IN EMEA
* CANADIAN SOLAR - AGREES WITH GLOBAL INVESTMENT HOLDINGS TO DEVELOP & OPERATE A SOLAR POWER PROJECTS PIPELINE WITH TOTAL CAPACITY OF UP TO 300 MWP
* CANADIAN SOLAR - CO WILL PROVIDE ENGINEERING, PROCUREMENT AND CONSTRUCTION AND OPERATIONS AND MAINTENANCE SERVICES TO THE SOLAR POWER PROJECTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
